00050   const char *usage[] = {
00051     "usage: random_read_test [options] <total-bytes>",
00052     "",
00053     "  options:",
00054     "    --blocksize=<n>         Size of values supplied in write test",
00055     "    --checksum-file=<file>  Write keys + value checksums to <file>",
00056     "    --config=<file>         Use <file> as Hypertable config file",
00057     "    --seed=<n>              Random number generator seed",
00058     "",
00059     "  This program ...",
00060     "",
00061     (const char *)0
00062   };
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066 }

00068 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00069   ClientPtr hypertable_client_ptr;
00070   TablePtr table_ptr;
00071   ScanSpecBuilder scan_spec;
00072   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00073   Cell cell;
00074   size_t blocksize = 0;
00075   uint64_t total = 0;
00076   unsigned long seed = 1234;
00077   String config_file;
00078   bool write_checksums = false;
00079   uint32_t checksum;
00080   ofstream checksum_out;
00081 
00082   for (size_t i=1; i<(size_t)argc; i++) {
00083     if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
00084       if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--blocksize=", 12)) {
00085         blocksize = atoi(&argv[i][12]);
00086       }
00087       else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--seed=", 7)) {
00088         seed = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00089       }
00090       else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--checksum-file=", 16)) {
00091         checksum_out.open(&argv[i][16]);
00092         write_checksums = true;
00093       }
00094       else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9)) {
00095         config_file = &argv[i][9];
00096       }
00097       else
00098         Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00099     }
00100     else {
00101       if (total != 0)
00102         Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00103       total = strtoll(argv[i], 0, 0);
00104     }
00105   }
00106 
00107   if (total == 0)
00108     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00109 
00110   System::initialize();
00111 
00112   Random::seed(seed);
00113 
00114   if (blocksize == 0)
00115     blocksize = 1000;
00116 
00117   size_t R = total / blocksize;
00118 
00119   try {
00120     if (config_file != "")
00121       hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client(
00122           System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]), config_file);
00123     else
00124       hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client(
00125           System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00126 
00127     table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table("RandomTest");
00128 
00129   }
00130   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00131     cerr << "error: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << " - " << e.what() << endl;
00132     return 1;
00133   }
00134 
00135   char key_data[32];
00136 
00137   key_data[12] = '\0';  // Row key: a random 12-digit number.
00138 
00139   Stopwatch stopwatch;
00140 
00141   {
00142     boost::progress_display progress_meter(R);
00143 
00144     try {
00145 
00146       for (size_t i = 0; i < R; ++i) {
00147 
00148         Random::fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(key_data, 12);
00149 
00150         scan_spec.clear();
00151         scan_spec.add_column("Field");
00152         scan_spec.add_row(key_data);
00153 
00154         TableScanner *scanner_ptr=table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec.get());
00155         int n = 0;
00156         while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00157           if (write_checksums) {
00158             checksum = fletcher32(cell.value, cell.value_len);
00159             checksum_out << key_data << "\t" << checksum << "\n";
00160           }
00161           ++n;
00162         }
00163         if (n != 1) {
00164           printf("Wrong number of results: %d (key=%s, i=%d)\n",
00165                  n, key_data, (int)i);
00166         }
00167         delete scanner_ptr;
00168 
00169         progress_meter += 1;
00170       }
00171 
00172     }
00173     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00174       cerr << "error: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << " - " << e.what()
00175            << endl;
00176       _exit(1);
00177     }
00178   }
00179 
00180   stopwatch.stop();
00181 
00182   if (write_checksums)
00183     checksum_out.close();
00184 
00185   double total_read = (double)total + (double)(R*12);
00186 
00187   printf("  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00188   printf(" Total scanned:  %llu\n", (Llu)R);
00189   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s\n",
00190          total_read / stopwatch.elapsed());
00191   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f scanned cells/s\n",
00192          (double)R / stopwatch.elapsed());
00193 
00194 }
